definition: holding first place in a contest, someone who is dazzlingly skilled in any field, to protect or fight for as a champion
details:
adjective
- holding first place in a contest
= example: holding first place in a contest
= synonyms: prizewinning
noun
- someone who is dazzlingly skilled in any field
= synonyms: adept, ace, genius, sensation, star, whiz, maven, mavin, hotshot, superstar, whizz, wizard, wiz
- someone who fights for a cause
= synonyms: fighter, hero, paladin
- someone who has won first place in a competition
= synonyms: champ
- a person who backs a politician or a team etc.
= synonyms: supporter, booster, friend, admirer, protagonist
verb
- to protect or fight for as a champion
= synonyms: defend
